title: Sony to pay up to $8 million in 'Interview' hacking lawsuit
text:
Published By: Reuters - Business - Today 
(Reuters) - Sony Pictures Entertainment Inc has agreed to pay up to $8 million to resolve a lawsuit by employees who claimed their personal ...
